user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
screen_desc: The screenshot shows an Amazon shopping cart with two items. The search bar at the top displays previous searches, including "LG Ultragear," "MacBook Pro 13 inch," and "Razer BlackWidow." Below, the cart contains a 24" LG UltraGear gaming monitor priced at $199.99 and a MacBook Pro 13 case for $19.80. The user has the option to proceed to checkout, with the ability to add a gift message.
